TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Behavior extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示由 管理的 对象。

span.span: Represents the objects that are managed by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类可以扩展来开发任何类型的用户界面行为，包括选择、 拖动和调整大小行为。This class can be extended to develop any type of user interface behavior, including selection, drag, and resize behaviors. 有关详细信息，请参阅[行为服务概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f)。For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f). > [!NOTE] > 你类型必须与关联类型。Your type must be associated with a type. 不支持独立于标志符号的行为。Glyph-independent behaviors are not supported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建您自己的类根据响应用户单击的类。The following code example demonstrates how to create your own class based on the class that responds to user clicks. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 父行为是由维护行为堆栈上的下一步行为。The parent behavior is the next behavior on the behavior stack maintained by the . 如果`callParentBehavior`参数是`true`，然后`behaviorService`参数不能`null`。If the `callParentBehavior` parameter is `true`, then the `behaviorService` parameter must not be `null`. `callParentBehavior` 指示是否基类应调用父行为，然后允许选择正确的父行为。`callParentBehavior` indicates whether the base class should call the parent behavior, and then allow the select the correct parent behavior.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否应该禁用 对象。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether objects should be disabled.

value.span: 如果所有设计器接收的对象的状态应设置为已启用 = false时这活动; 否则为。

span.span: if all objects the designer receives should have states set to Enabled = false when this is active; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个`true`值属性指示向的所有该设计器接收的对象应具有其状态已禁用此行为处于活动状态时。A `true` value for the property indicates to the that all objects the designer receives should have their state disabled when this behavior is active. 属性的工作原理与结合方法，以便你可以自定义标志符号和行为之间的交互。The property works in conjunction with the method so you can customize the interaction between glyphs and behaviors. 下表总结了对的调用结果为特定。The following table summarizes the results of a call to for a particular . || 为 `true` is `true`| 为 `false` is `false`| |-|-|-| |命中测试的标志符号具有的分配的行为Hit-tested glyph has an assigned behavior|如果与指定`command ID`中找到，则该禁用并将其返回。If the with the specified `command ID` is found in the , that is disabled and returned. 否则将返回 `null`。Otherwise, `null` is returned.| 对该行为调用，并且在找到，该行为的返回。 is called on the behavior and, if found, the behavior’s is returned. 否则为结果具有指定`command ID`返回。Otherwise, the result of with the specified `command ID` is returned.| |命中测试的标志符号具有未分配的行为Hit-tested glyph has no assigned behavior|结果具有指定`command ID`返回。The result of with the specified `command ID` is returned.|结果具有指定`command ID`返回。The result of with the specified `command ID` is returned.|

span.span: The default implementation always returns .

summary.span: 在丢失鼠标捕获时由装饰器窗口调用。

span.span: Called by the adorner window when it loses mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一种行为可以通过将自身推送到行为堆栈上请求行为服务通过鼠标捕获方法。A behavior can request mouse capture through the behavior service by pushing itself onto the behavior stack with the method. 如果如此，它将会通知通过方法时捕获会丢失。If it does so, it will be notified through the method when capture is lost. 通常行为本身从堆栈中移除这一次。Generally the behavior removes itself from the stack at this time. 当发生以下操作之一时，捕获将丢失：Capture is lost when one of the following actions occurs: - 其他人请求捕获。Someone else requests capture. - 推送另一种行为。Another behavior is pushed. - 此行为已被移除。This behavior is removed. 在每个这些情况下，将对该行为调用。In each of these cases, will be called on the behavior.

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

summary.span: 在任何双击消息进入 的装饰器窗口时调用。

span.span: Called when any double-click message enters the adorner window of the .

returns.span: 如果消息已处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the message was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何双击消息进入时调用方法`WndProc`装饰器窗口的。The method is called when any double-click message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the . 消息首先会在这里，传递到最顶层行为堆栈中。The message is first passed here, to the top-most in the behavior stack. 返回`true`从此方法表示消息已由和不应继续进行处理。Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the and should not continue to be processed. 在这里，将消息发送到相应的行为。From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理双击消息。The following code example demonstrates how to handle a double-click message. 完整代码列表，请参阅[如何： 扩展的外观和行为的控件在设计模式下](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs/CS/DesignerDemoControl.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs/VB/DesignerDemoControl.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何鼠标按下消息进入时调用方法`WndProc`装饰器窗口的。The method is called when any mouse-down message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the . 消息首先会在这里，传递到最顶层行为堆栈中。The message is first passed here, to the top-most in the behavior stack. 返回`true`从此方法表示消息已由和不应继续进行处理。Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the and should not continue to be processed. 在这里，将消息发送到相应的行为。From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何鼠标悬停消息进入时调用方法`WndProc`装饰器窗口的。The method is called when any mouse-hover message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the . 消息首先会在这里，传递到最顶层行为堆栈中。The message is first passed here, to the top-most in the behavior stack. 返回`true`从此方法表示消息已由和不应继续进行处理。Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the and should not continue to be processed. 在这里，将消息发送到相应的行为。From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
